title: Add activity feed dropdown to header
description:
Add activity feed to tick-header using Shoelace dropdown:

Components:
- sl-dropdown in header
- sl-button trigger with bell icon and unread count badge
- sl-menu with activity items

Activity item display:
- Icon based on action type (created, updated, closed, etc.)
- Tick title (truncated) with link
- Action description
- Relative timestamp (e.g., '2 minutes ago')

Data source:
- Fetch from /api/activity endpoint
- Poll every 30s or use WebSocket updates
- Show last 20 activities
- Mark as read when dropdown opens

Test: Open dropdown, verify activities show, clicking item opens tick
acceptance_criteria: Activity feed shows recent actions, unread badge updates, clicking activity opens tick in drawer
